text: Robert Fico (; born 15 September 1964) is a Slovak politician. He is the Prime Minister of Slovakia since 2023. He was Prime Minister before from 2012 until his resignation in 2018. Fico also was the Prime Minister from 4 July 2006 to 8 July 2010. He has been the leader of the Direction – Social Democracy (SMER- SD) party since 1999. In May 2023, Robert Fico was shot and injured. On 15 May 2024, Fico was injured in a shooting in Handlová in front of the city's House of Culture after attending an event at the House of Culture, and was hospitalized in critical condition. He had been shot in the head, chest and stomach. A suspect was detained. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Slovakia Category:Current national leaders Category:Nitra Region
title: Robert Fico
